name: Agony's Eyes
description: On bringing these goggles over your eyes, you see a flash of a memory: Wasting away in the cold, then coming to in a Form distinctly unlike your own.

name: Arcane Contraption
description: An abandoned sphere that seemed to have an intent and purpose once - Perhaps in news hands, someone could unlock its hidden magic.

name: Armor of the Red Dragon
description: Glamered Armor: A suit of plate armor fashioned after a red dragon.

name: Auspicious Bracers
description: Charms of good fortune have been worked into the surface of these bracers. Do they work? Time will tell.

name: Baron Aubrecker's Family Amulet
description: The power this amulet confers appears to be of a much higher quality than the amulet itself.

name: Baron Aubrecker's Monogrammed Belt
description: The monogramming on this belt looks elegant until you look at it closely, where the rough edges betray it.

name: Baron Aubrecker's Monogrammed Gloves
description: The material of these gloves is already flaking at the fingers.

name: Baron Aubrecker's Monogrammed Gloves
description: The material of these gloves is already flaking at the fingers.

name: Beads of Winter
description: Each bead on this necklace is chilling to the touch.

name: Black Dynamo
description: This small obsidian device on a long chain hums softly.

name: Bleak Alternator
description: This small piece of machinery can be used to create dreadful machinery in Lamordia.
dropLocationRaw: {{AdventurePackDrop|The Chill of Ravenloft (Pack)|Any Chest|Heroic}}{{DropLocation|Land of Lamordia|Any Rare Chest||Heroic}}

name: Bleak Conductor
description: This small piece of machinery can be used to create dreadful machinery in Lamordia.

description: This small piece of machinery can be used to create dreadful machinery in Lamordia.

description: This small piece of machinery can be used to create dreadful machinery in Lamordia.

name: Bleak Wire
description: This small piece of machinery can be used to create dreadful machinery in Lamordia.

name: Bodysnatcher's Bracers
description: Standard issue for working the graveyard shift.

name: Bottle of Freezing Mist
description:
Teleports you to Ludendorf Town Hall.

If you have not yet completed the quest "The Bodysnatchers" this life, this item will place you in House Jorasco near the entrance to that quest. Otherwise, this item will send you directly to [[Ludendorf City Hall]] in Barovia.
dropLocationRaw: {{ExpansionReceived|The Chill of Ravenloft|Ultimate Fan|The Chill of Ravenloft (Expansion)}}

name: Buckle of Secrets
description: This buckle conceals a small compartment, which could easily house small components, hidden messages, or a small dose of poison.

description: Small slots in this weapon could easily fit small augmentation devices.

name: Cataclysmic Buckler
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Cataclysmic Large Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Cataclysmic Small Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Cataclysmic Tower Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Claws of the Coldlight Walker
description: Sharper than they appear, these gloves fell from the form of a fallen Coldlight Walker.

name: Climber's Remembrance
description: On donning this necklace, you remember a murder most foul, the determination of vengeance, the gleam of armor, and a fatal uphill climb.

name: Cloak of the Red Dragon
description: Cosmetic Cloak: A cloak fashioned after a red dragon.

name: Coldlight Runners
description: You don't need to be swift - you just need to be swifter than the Coldlight Walkers.

name: Contraption Keyring
description: Turning this ring's face grants the bearer a boost in energy.

name: Cosmetic Volcanic Great Axe
description: Cosmetic Weapon: This is the weapon of the Volcanic set.

name: Deadmonger Gang's Signet
description: Used exclusively by higher-ups in the Deadmonger gang, this adds legitimacy to secret correspondences

name: Death's Anchor
description: Deathly magic follows this device, which seems to tether it to wherever this energy came from.

name: Downcast Armor
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Downcast Bowler
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Downcast Brawler's Garb
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Downcast Cap
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Downcast Cowl
description: This discarded cowl has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Downcast Docent
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this docent, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Downcast Elegant Cloak
description: Once discarded, this cloak seeks new life.

name: Downcast Gambeson
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Downcast Heavy Cloak
description: This cloak was left in the snow when it became too heavy a burden to bear for a beleaguered traveler.

name: Downcast Helm
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric

name: Downcast Mystic Cloak
description: A lingering warmth permeates the threads of this magical cloak.

name: Downcast Nimble Cloak
description: This cloak was abandoned on a rooftop when skullduggery went wrong.

name: Downcast Robe
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Downcast Stoic Cloak
description: This thick cloak has been used in the past, but seems to have held together despite everything.

name: Downcast Top Hat
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Downcast Vest
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Elise's Grasp
description: Reach out for the truth, and perhaps you can take it for your own.

name: Experimental Rocket Boots
description: A tinkerer built these, but unfortunately forgot to build in a way to stop. They then built the brakes with a broken arm.

name: Flickering Divinity
description: Light sputters softly somewhere within this orb, a lingering link to some far-off divinity.

name: Frost Worm Tooth Ring
description: The sharp spike of a tooth rises up from the band of this ring.

name: Frostforged Buckler
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Frostforged Large Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Frostforged Small Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Frostforged Tower Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Frostwell
description: A vessel for the biting cold of the wind whipping through the snowy streets.

name: Frozen Contraption
description: The whirring mechanisms at play here freeze up often - Nothing that some swift percussive maintenance can't fix, however.

name: Ghastly Guards
description: You can see through the material of these bracers. Blows seem to slide around them.

name: Ghastly Guards
description: You can see through the material of these bracers. Blows seem to slide around them.
enchantmentsRaw: {{ItemFeat|Wind Through the Trees|||Wind Through the Trees}}{{Immune|Fear}}

name: Gloves of the Graverobber
description: These grant a good grip, whether that be on shove, coffin, or cadaver.

name: Goggles of the Frozen Night
description: A mild warmth eminates around the lenses, preventing frost from forming.

name: Golden Souvenir Coin
description: A memento of Ludendorf, a relief of town hall is imprinted on its reverse face. The gold of this coin shimmers.

name: Gravekeeper's Armor
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Gravekeeper's Bowler
description: This once belonged to the owner of a sprawling cemetery.

name: Gravekeeper's Brawler Garb
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Gravekeeper's Cap
description: A well-made cap meant for those digging graves.

name: Gravekeeper's Cowl
description: For the gravekeeper that knows where all the good treasures are buried.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|A Light in the Attic|Secret Area Chest||Heroic}}

name: Gravekeeper's Docent
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Gravekeeper's Elegant Cloak
description: Even the elegant and eloquent eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Gravekeeper's Gambeson
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Gravekeeper's Greaves
description: A set of sturdy boots made to kick through dirt with ease.

name: Gravekeeper's Heavy Cloak
description: Even the hale and hearty eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Gravekeeper's Helm
description: Guards were once hired to protect a nearby cemetery. This helmet is a reminder of their failure.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|Land of Lamordia|[[Fang of Winter|Fang of Winter's]] Chest||Heroic}}

name: Gravekeeper's Mystic Cloak
description: Even the mystic and powerful eventually find themselves in the grave.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|Beneath the City Streets|[[Dead Man's Wrath|Dead Man's Wrath's]] Chest||Heroic}}

name: Gravekeeper's Nimble Cloak
description: Even the quick and the clever eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Gravekeeper's Robe
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Gravekeeper's Stoic Cloak
description: Even the upright and stoic eventually find themselves in the grave.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|Land of Lamordia|[[Fang of Winter|Fang of Winter's]] Chest||Heroic}}

name: Gravekeeper's Top Hat
description: Financing a cemetery seemed like a sure bet, but the financier that owned this hat wasn't especially good with numbers.

name: Gravekeeper's Vest
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

pageTitle: Greater Offering to the Dark Powers
name: Greater Offering to the Dark Powers
description: A primitive doll made from the bones, wire and dross this object feels cold to the touch. You have the unsettling feeling it looks a like a like bit like you.

name: Greater Volcanic Coffer
description: Contains everything in the [[Volcanic Coffer]] as well as the Volcanic Plate Armor Cosmetic, Volcanic Plate Helm Cosmetic, Volcanic Cloak, and 20 character bank slots on one character of your choice. To gain access to the cosmetics and character storage, speak with Zeanna in the Eberron Hall of Heroes. The Creature Companion will be delivered directly to your pet stable the next time you log into a character.
details: When used, receive all of the following:20 additional slots of Character Bank Storage10 additional slots of Shared Bank Storage[[Cosmetic Volcanic Great Axe]][[Volcanic Glamered Weapon Aura]][[Volcanic Phoenix Hatchling]][[Volcanic Plate Armor]][[Volcanic Plate Helm]][[Volcanic Cloak]]

name: Grick-skin Gauntlets
description: The skin forming these gauntlets looks like rock - Tiny barbs line the knuckles.

name: Hag Queen's Cloak
description: Cosmetic Cloak: A cloak fit for a queen... who happens to be a hag, and likes tattered things...

name: Hag Queen's Hat
description: Cosmetic Headwear: A hat fit for a queen... who happens to be a hag, and likes tattered things...

name: Hag Queen's Robe
description: Glamered Armor: A set of robes fit for a queen... who happens to be a hag, and likes tattered things...

name: Heartshard
description: This crystalline fragment pulses in your hands.

name: Hooves of the Nightmare
description: Where dreams run, the night's terrible horse goes.

name: Icewalkers
description: For traversing the winter's drifts.

name: Lamordian Armor
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Lamordian Bowler
description: A rounded bowler for a dapper gentleperson.

name: Lamordian Brawler's Garb
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Lamordian Cap
description: A smart and sturdy cap.

name: Lamordian Cowl
description: For traversing the winter's drifts.

name: Lamordian Docent
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Lamordian Elegant Cloak
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Lamordian Gambeson
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Lamordian Heavy Cloak
description: Sturdier than other cloaks of its make, this is useful for when you anticipate the knives coming out.

name: Lamordian Helm
description: Once worn by private guards of aristocracy, these helms are often left by the side of the road. This one appears to have been modified.

name: Lamordian Mystic Cloak
description: Woven with arcane thread, this mantle has been to look similar to cloaks with far less power.

name: Lamordian Nimble Cloak
description: A lightweight cloak for when speed matters.

name: Lamordian Robe
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Lamordian Stoic Cloak
description: The markings on the top of this cloak announced the station of a well-employed guard.

name: Lamordian Top Hat
description: Noble. Distinguished. Taller than most other hats.

name: Lamordian Vest
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Legendary  Lamordian Gambeson
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

pageTitle: Legendary Claws of the Coldlight Walker
name: Legendary Claws of the Coldlight Walker
description: Sharper than they appear, these gloves fell from the form of a fallen Coldlight Walker.

name: Legendary Climber's Remembrance
description: On donning this necklace, you remember a murder most foul, the determination of vengeance, the gleam of armor, and a fatal uphill climb.

name: Legendary Coldlight Runners
description: You don't need to be swift - you just need to be swifter than the Coldlight Walkers.

name: Legendary Contraption Keyring
description: Turning this ring's face grants the bearer a boost in energy.

name: Legendary Deadmonger Gang's Signet
description: Used exclusively by higher-ups in the Deadmonger gang, this adds legitimacy to secret correspondences

name: Legendary Death's Anchor
description: Deathly magic follows this device, which seems to tether it to wherever this energy came from.

name: Legendary Downcast Armor
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Legendary Downcast Bowler
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Legendary Downcast Brawler's Garb
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Legendary Downcast Cap
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Legendary Downcast Cowl
description: This discarded cowl has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Legendary Downcast Docent
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this docent, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Legendary Downcast Elegant Cloak
description: Once discarded, this cloak seeks new life.

name: Legendary Downcast Gambeson
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Legendary Downcast Heavy Cloak
description: This cloak was left in the snow when it became too heavy a burden to bear for a beleaguered traveler.

name: Legendary Downcast Helm
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric

name: Legendary Downcast Mystic Cloak
description: A lingering warmth permeates the threads of this magical cloak.

name: Legendary Downcast Nimble Cloak
description: This cloak was abandoned on a rooftop when skullduggery went wrong.

name: Legendary Downcast Robe
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Legendary Downcast Stoic Cloak
description: This thick cloak has been used in the past, but seems to have held together despite everything.

name: Legendary Downcast Top Hat
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Legendary Downcast Vest
description: Experimental socketry is integrated well into this garment, allowing it to push past its normal limits.

name: Legendary Elise's Grasp
description: Reach out for the truth, and perhaps you can take it for your own.

name: Legendary Experimental Rocket Boots
description: A tinkerer built these, but unfortunately forgot to build in a way to stop. They then built the brakes with a broken arm.

name: Legendary Flickering Divinity
description: Light sputters softly somewhere within this orb, a lingering link to some far-off divinity.

name: Legendary Frost Worm Tooth Ring
description: The sharp spike of a tooth rises up from the band of this ring.

name: Legendary Frostforged Buckler
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Legendary Frostforged Large Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Legendary Frostforged Small Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Legendary Frostforged Tower Shield
description: Augmentation slots line the back of this shield, allowing tinkerers to unlock its full potential.

name: Legendary Frostwell
description: A vessel for the biting cold of the wind whipping through the snowy streets.

name: Legendary Frozen Contraption
description: The whirring mechanisms at play here freeze up often - Nothing that some swift percussive maintenance can't fix, however.

name: Legendary Gloves of the Graverobber
description: These grant a good grip, whether that be on shove, coffin, or cadaver.

pageTitle: Legendary Goggles of the Frozen Night
name: Legendary Goggles of the Frozen Night
description: A mild warmth eminates around the lenses, preventing frost from forming.

name: Legendary Golden Souvenir Coin
description: A memento of Ludendorf, a relief of town hall is imprinted on its reverse face. The gold of this coin shimmers.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Armor
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Bowler
description: This once belonged to the owner of a sprawling cemetery.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Brawler Garb
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Cap
description: A well-made cap meant for those digging graves.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Cowl
description: For the gravekeeper that knows where all the good treasures are buried.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|A Light in the Attic|Secret Area Chest||Legendary}}

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Docent
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Elegant Cloak
description: Even the elegant and eloquent eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Gambeson
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Greaves
description: A set of sturdy boots made to kick through dirt with ease.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Heavy Cloak
description: Even the hale and hearty eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Helm
description: Guards were once hired to protect a nearby cemetery. This helmet is a reminder of their failure.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|Land of Lamordia|[[Fang of Winter|Fang of Winter's]] Chest||Legendary}}

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Mystic Cloak
description: Even the mystic and powerful eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Nimble Cloak
description: Even the quick and the clever eventually find themselves in the grave.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Robe
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Stoic Cloak
description: Even the upright and stoic eventually find themselves in the grave.
dropLocationRaw: {{DropLocation|Land of Lamordia|[[Fang of Winter|Fang of Winter's]] Chest||Legendary}}

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Top Hat
description: Financing a cemetery seemed like a sure bet, but the financier that owned this hat wasn't especially good with numbers.

name: Legendary Gravekeeper's Vest
description: Sturdy, yet fashionable, clothing suitable for working six feet down.

name: Legendary Grick-skin Gauntlets
description: The skin forming these gauntlets looks like rock - Tiny barbs line the knuckles.

name: Legendary Heartshard
description: This crystalline fragment pulses in your hands.

name: Legendary Hooves of the Nightmare
description: Where dreams run, the night's terrible horse goes.

name: Legendary Icewalkers
description: For traversing the winter's drifts.

name: Legendary Lamordian Armor
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Legendary Lamordian Bowler
description: A rounded bowler for a dapper gentleperson.

name: Legendary Lamordian Brawler's Garb
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Legendary Lamordian Cap
description: A smart and sturdy cap.

name: Legendary Lamordian Cowl
description: For traversing the winter's drifts.

name: Legendary Lamordian Docent
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Legendary Lamordian Elegant Cloak
description: This discarded hat has had extra experimental slots worked into its fabric.

name: Legendary Lamordian Heavy Cloak
description: Sturdier than other cloaks of its make, this is useful for when you anticipate the knives coming out.

name: Legendary Lamordian Helm
description: Once worn by private guards of aristocracy, these helms are often left by the side of the road. This one appears to have been modified.

name: Legendary Lamordian Mystic Cloak
description: Woven with arcane thread, this mantle has been to look similar to cloaks with far less power.

name: Legendary Lamordian Nimble Cloak
description: A lightweight cloak for when speed matters.

name: Legendary Lamordian Robe
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Legendary Lamordian Stoic Cloak
description: The markings on the top of this cloak announced the station of a well-employed guard.

name: Legendary Lamordian Top Hat
description: Noble. Distinguished. Taller than most other hats.

name: Legendary Lamordian Vest
description: Timeless style, meant to protect from the bitter colds.

name: Legendary Ludendorf Class Ring
description: The year this ring's bearer graduated has been worn off entirely.

pageTitle: Legendary Mark of the Dark Powers
name: Legendary Mark of the Dark Powers
description: A vile emblem, carved in apparent worship of the Dark Powers. Whatever pact the artisan formed, it does not appear to have saved them.

name: Legendary Miner's Reinforced Belt
description: Stone plates ring this belt, absorbing impact.

name: Legendary Mining Lenses
description: While wearing these, rocks and debris in your way become simply a miner inconvenience.

name: Legendary Scientist's Sights
description: These lenses slightly magnify small details, a fine bit of magic for the aspiring tinkerer.

name: Legendary Socket Band
description: A socket filled with a cloudy blue gem comprises this band.

name: Legendary Socket Chain
description: This chain has sockets linked into it - Many are filled with small blue stones, housing arcane energy.

name: Legendary Souvenir Coin
description: A memento of Ludendorf, a relief of town hall is imprinted on its reverse face.

name: Legendary Surreptitious Shackles
description: On closing the shackle, a memory flashes by: A form that isn't your own, breaking free from your bonds, your desire for revenge insatiable.

name: Legendary Tangle of Wires
description: This mess of wires seems to carry some form of arcane charge, in spite of their frayed state.

name: Legendary The Baron's Bandolier
description: The bandolier of the Baron's fallen body.

pageTitle: Legendary Tiny Brain in a Tiny Jar
name: Legendary Tiny Brain in a Tiny Jar
description: Is this a real brain, or simply a bauble that looks like one? You're sure not opening the jar to find out.

name: Legendary Unbridled Power
description: A strong enough electric shock can end life. Another strong one can begin it again.

name: Legendary Viktra's Experiment
description: Crafted by Viktra, these goggles did not prove out a hypothesis and were immediately discard. In the right hands, though, they may find new purpose.

name: Legendary Wintery Wrappings
description: Cold doesn't perturb those wearing thick wrappings like these.

description: The year this ring's bearer graduated has been worn off entirely.
